scripts.build:ios:aarhus: react-native bundle --entry-file='index.js' --bundle-output='./ios/main.jsbundle' --dev=false --platform='ios' --assets-dest='./ios' && cd ios && xcodebuild clean archive -scheme AarhusCharter     -configuration Release && open '/Applications/XCode.app' && cd ../

_comment.0: If you want to update to react-native >= 0.60 keep in mind that on ExcursionBuyPaymentWebView is used WebView from react-native. WebView is remove from react-native begining with 0.60 and moved to react-native-webview, but the component from react-native-webview has some problems with DIBS payment window on iOS 13.3
_comment.1: Removed postinstall script ( "postinstall": "react-native-schemes-manager all" ) because in react-native >= 0.60.6 it will not be necessary to use it after each yarn
